Type.Name: DestroyNotify

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DestroyNotify extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A delegate run by some callbacks before object destruction.
Docs.remarks: Used in , , and anywhere else that a run-before-object-destruction routine is needed in a callback.
